

```{r}

library(Biostrings)

#---------------------------
# Load sequences from FASTA
#---------------------------
seqs <- readAAStringSet("virus_proteins.fasta")

# Check what you loaded
seqs
names(seqs)

# Ensure exactly two sequences
stopifnot(length(seqs) == 2)

# Extract and clean sequences
s1 <- seqs[[1]]
s2 <- seqs[[2]]

# Remove whitespace, newlines, stray characters
s1 <- AAString(gsub("[^A-Za-z]", "", as.character(s1)))
s2 <- AAString(gsub("[^A-Za-z]", "", as.character(s2)))

#---------------------------
# Pairwise alignment
#---------------------------
align <- pairwiseAlignment(
    pattern = s1,
    subject = s2,
    substitutionMatrix = "BLOSUM62",
    gapOpening = -10,
    gapExtension = -0.5,
    scoreOnly = FALSE
)

align



```
